translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……確かに貴方の心は強いですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Certainly, your heart is strong, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誤解ね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a misunderstanding.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の心は強くなんてないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My heart is not strong at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は痛みも孤独も永遠も恐れない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I do not fear pain, loneliness, or eternity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、それは恐怖を感じるものが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But that's only because feeling fear is something that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人と違うというだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: distinguishes humans from others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私が最も怖れることはね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What I fear the most is this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世に天国がないと知ることよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To learn that there is no heaven in this world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世が愛で出来ていないと認めること」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To admit that this world is not made of love."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、私が救いになる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Therefore, I will be the salvation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「全ての生き物が死に絶えても安心して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even if all living beings perish, I will be at peace,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私だけは全ての生物を愛し続ける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for I alone will continue to love all creatures."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ねえ、だって私は全てが愛おしいのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You see, because I cherish everything."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「風も土も花も、人も魔物も、そして神も」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The wind, the earth, the flowers, humans, monsters, and even gods."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ルドラサウムは哀れな子よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rudrasaum is a pitiful child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの子だけが世界で唯一、愛を知らない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only that child does not know love in the entire world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、私が愛するの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is why I will love."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世にある全てが愛おしい私は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I cherish everything in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だからこの世の救いになりたいの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and so I want to be the salvation of this world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は神に成り代わろうなんて思ってない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I do not intend to replace God."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「天国になりたいの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to become heaven."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「永遠に正気のまま生き続けられるなら好都合。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It would be ideal to live forever while staying sane.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の愛だけはこの世界で永遠になれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My love alone can be eternal in this world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は皆にとっての天国になれるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can become heaven for everyone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、狂ってますね、貴方」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As expected, you are insane."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、正気よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, I am sane."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「祈って救って愛して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Praying, saving, loving,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それしか出来ないただの女の子よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that is all I can do, just an ordinary girl."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……子、ではありませんよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I am not a child, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少なくとも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is that so?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで話はおしまいと言うように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if to say the conversation was over,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アムが立ち上がる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amu stands up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「上手くいくことを祈ってね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pray that it goes well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王なんだし得意でしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the Pope, so I guess you're good at that, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はなんとか上手く行ってるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, things are going somewhat well, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万年後は分からない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what will happen tens of thousands of years from now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっとここ数十年が一番平和な時代ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surely, these past few decades are the most peaceful era."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達といる日々は楽しいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The days I spend with you all are enjoyable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、疑ってるわね。本当よ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, you're doubting me, aren't you? It's true, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達は全員、本当に心から愛おしいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All of you, I truly cherish from the bottom of my heart."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、貴方を説得しようなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As I thought, trying to convince you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から無意味だったようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was meaningless from the very beginning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嬉しかったわ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was glad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の心を知っていて説得しようとした人は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because you were the first person to know my heart and try to persuade me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方が初めてだったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were the first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが私を心配してのものなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that was out of concern for me,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're the Pope, so I guess you're good at that, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今はなんとか上手く行ってるけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, things are going somewhat well, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数万年後は分からない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know what will happen tens of thousands of years from now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きっとここ数十年が一番平和な時代ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surely, these past few decades are the most peaceful era."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The days I spend with you all are enjoyable."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふ、疑ってるわね。本当よ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, you're doubting me, aren't you? It's true, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴方達は全員、本当に心から愛おしいわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "All of you, I truly cherish from the bottom of my heart."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やはり、貴方を説得しようなんて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As I thought, trying to convince you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初から無意味だったようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was meaningless from the very beginning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嬉しかったわ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was glad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私の心を知っていて説得しようとした人は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: because you were the first person to know my heart and try to persuade me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴方が初めてだったから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You were the first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが私を心配してのものなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that was out of concern for me,
